name: assistant
description:
"   To show the prototype of function or method, just press <C-h>,also upport user complete function(<C-x-u>) 
"   Now support php and vim(zh-cn) function list.
"   It's very easy to make your self function list, see the file in assistant dir, the help file formate is like 'key' => 'value'

"   <C-h>快捷键显示当前位置函数的原型，支持PHP、Vim脚本
"   <C-x-u>补全当前位置函数
"   若喜欢用netbeans或者eclipse的补全快捷键，可以将=config=中的键映射启用。
"   需要添加支持更多的文件，只要将符合 键=>值 形式的字典文件
"   以 补全文件后缀名.txt 保存到 assistant 目录下即可，1.35版之后会自动载入。
install_details: Just put the files into ~/.vim/plugin or <HOMEDIR>\vimfiles\plugin (for Windows).

versions.release_notes: Automatically detect the assistant file directory.
Now auto "set completefunc" when BufEnter, BufRead and filetype changed...

Fixed some bug, and support user complete function(<C-x-u>)
Thanks for Caglar Toklu.
